channel.title: Want do noob add or change in servers
channel.description:
ok im soon gonna be releasing dragscape v.7
but im trying to make it noob friendly so wat do noob add apart from
shops (handled) drops (handled) npc saying things like :dragscape rules commands (handled) objects (handled) menus player to stuff (whiteyboy5)
